化学设施警告 CISA CSAT 违规可能导致数据被盗https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/chemical-facilities-warned-of-possible-data-theft-in-cisa-csat-breach/ Mon, 24 Jun 2024 16:53:18 -0400劳伦斯·艾布拉姆斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/chemical-facilities-warned-of-possible-data-theft-in-cisa-csat-breach/ CISA is warning that its Chemical Security Assessment Tool (CSAT) environment was breached in January after hackers deployed a webshell on its Ivanti device, potentially exposing sensitive security assessments and plans. Android 版 Chrome 测试功能可通过网站安全地验证您的 ID https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/google/chrome-for-android-tests-feature-that-securely-verizes-your-id-with-sites/ Mon, 24 Jun 2024 15:50:00 -0400玛雅克·帕尔玛GoogleSoftware https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/google/chrome-for-android-tests-feature-that-securely-verizes-your-id-with-sites/ Google is testing a new feature called "Digital Credential API" for Chrome on Android that will allow websites to request identity information from mobile wallets using Android's IdentityCredential system.
